name: convo-hub
description: Full Modern plataform enterprise production ready course. A Project based on TabNews from Curso.dev

scripts.dev: npm run services:up && npm run wait-for-postgres && npm run migration:up && next dev
scripts.test: npm run services:up && concurrently -n next,jest --hide next -k -s command-jest "next dev" "jest --runInBand"
scripts.testExpanded: npm run services:up && concurrently --names next,jest --hide next --kill-others --success command-jest "sleep 5; next dev" "jest --runInBand --verbose"
